de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.renderer
Class AbstractRenderer

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.renderer.AbstractRenderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnvironmentRenderer, PrettyStringRenderer
public abstract class AbstractRenderer
extends Object

Abstract base class for the PrettyStringRenderer providing fonts, colors and fontmetrices to perform the rendering.

All the Colors and Fonts coms from the current Theme.

Author:
marcell
